Name: Nacarat
Review Text:
My First time visiting the Terrace  this year .
It was a little bit cold out but they had the heat lamps on which was great we had a quick drink and a quick bite to eat it was really good the service was friendly I will definitely go back and recommend this to someone else that’s visiting Montreal

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Situated right in the heart of downtown, a sure shot win for those who planned this venue for wooing it's date. My date had a negroni and couldn't resist having 2 more. The whole Ambiance looked classy. Got some garlic shrimp and striploins …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: So yes the ambience was great!!! But the food had a piece of plastic in it.  And the waiter did not offer to bring another order so I couldn’t finish my food.   So I gave it a 2 because the service and food were not so good.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: We were happily seated at the Nacarat Bar for late afternoon snacks. The food and ambiance were great. The view is amazing, definitely a great spot not to be missed when in downtown Montreal.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: I have been a client since the opening. John Lennon and Yoko Ono had a famous stay at the Fairmont Queen Elizabeth, where this bar is located - so everything, unsurprisingly - service, drinks and food is nothing less than impeccable, despite the COVID situation!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very chic place for cocktails. Beautiful outdoor terrace atop the Queen Elizabeth.   Staff were excellent.  Food was delicious! We ordered a board of grilled veg and some meat to share...it was amazing!  Just kind of expensive , it was $160!  Don't expect to fill up in this.  I guess you're paying for the atmosphere.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text:
Positive points:
-Clean and aesthetically pleasing bar
-Original, visually attractive and well organized menu …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Great staff, great cocktail. Lounge experience is more interesting than the terrasse.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Most clever cocktails with surprisingly great flavour combinations in a beautiful elegant decor. Only things that deserve an upgrade is the sound system playing good lounge music from hospital speakers and the snacks which were …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: The staff is accommodating and lovely. Every cocktail I had was specially curated for my tastes. They asked lots of questions and also gave great recommendations. The bartenders know what they are doing and do it well! I've been there …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Nacarat Bar at the Queen Elizabeth Hotel in Montreal, Canada is a beautiful bar. The bartenders are very serious about making amazing drinks. They take the quality time to make their designer drinks. The bar is a great place to hangout with …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: This place is very cool! It’s on a rooftop terrace so you get a great view of the city. I went on a Friday night and it wasn’t too crowded, and there was a DJ there too. The meat and cheese platter is great, but a little pricey. Wait staff were nice and attentive as well.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: great service, cozy but cool and modern bar - really enjoyed the bartender’s recommendation of the p’tit-louis and welcome cocktails!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Matisse was very professional and nice. The cocktails were super delicious! Me and my friends had such an amazing time in Montreal, thank you Nacarat team! We will be back!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Love this new Terasse, went there last Thursday for a 5-7. Loved the ambiance, a bit full but turnover is ok. You have great a crowd. I ordered the pink sangria which tasted so good and refreshing. My friend and i got a seat and we ordered …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very nice and cozy cocktail bar located inside the Queen Elizabeth Hotel.  The cocktail menu is impressive - the organization of cocktails is logical and the creations are very original. Staff is very knowledgeable and can guide you through the choice of the perfect cocktail!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very nice terrace for evening drink or after office hours. Service is great and good choice of food

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Nacarat is everything you ever wanted and then some. Its sophistication and sensuality is worthy of a Donald Draper hangout spot. They are not bartenders, but liquid masters at work.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Went on a saturday night blender with the boys, service and quality was amazing. Ron is the legendary waiter

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Great spot, wonderful views from the outdoor terrace/lounge. Service was stellar, and the finger foods were great. Prices were fair. I’d definitely go again for a 5 a 7. …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Amazing terrace just opened for the summer season! Great cocktails, nice grilled food and amazing DJ!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Amazing cocktail bat in the heart of downtown Montreal at the infamous Fairmount Queen Elizabeth. The cocktail menu is world class and the bartenders as well. So professional and talented. A pleasure to watch in action. Don't miss the …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Lovely bar , amazing drinks , the menu was truly impressive , this bar was apparently recognized as one of the best in Canada. I loved their version of Pina Colada .

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: I visited on 30th -Dec-2019, I would like to say it is simply superb, environment, lounge music, employee working behind bar, or who is bring a food for you. It was amazing as I enjoyed my evening with single malt perfectly served. I have …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Food. Drinks. Ambiance. The staff. Everything there is perfect. P.s.: try everything on the menu. It's totally worth it.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very beautiful bar with great atmosphere and very friendly and helpful staff. They know their drinks and are open to personalize your drink. A nice touch of class. Well done.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: One of those places that you go for the atmosphere; it has delicious food and drink but just slightly out of reach (price-wise), so not likely to frequent often. Wide range of drinks, less food options but the portions are small anyway. Music and staff were great!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Great drinks and great music. Crowd is a mixed bag. Pro tip: Don't order blind.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Love it  here. Beautiful terrace with a Miami feel. Loved their jumbo shrimp entrance

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Good food with great cocktails

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very classy bar! My husband and I have been here a few times while staying in the hotel, and the bar itself is very nice. They have many original, unique drinks along with wine and regular items. We were there on a Thursday around 6:00 PM …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Great service and atmosphere! The staff are very polite and helpful. The bartender who made our drinks was very fun and interesting to watch! Making your drink appeared to be an art to him, and he was definitely a true master at it! …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Amazing cocktails! Really awesome bar.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Cocktails are amazing but it was a Friday night at last call (which is fairly early) and the waiter came around and asked if we wanted another drink but refused to let us see the menu. It seemed super rude and not very customer service …

Review Text: I went to Nacarat Bar just before the new year on a Friday night. We were a total of 6 people. The ambiance was great, and enjoyed having comfortable seats to sit in while we were there. The drinks were amazing and very creative. The music …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Came from out of town for the weekend so we came for drinks and food both nights since it was located in our hotel. Great service Friday night with a young man which brought us back the next evening as well... Absolutely TERRIBLE service …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: The drinks were amazing.. the mixologist had such an attention to detail. We were even welcomed with a free cocktail (part of a Grand Marnier promotion I think) And finally the ambiance is just perfect.. dark and sexy. Will definitely be going again

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Excellent cocktails in a cool venue with great atmosphere.  I highly recommend it.

Review Text: Friendly service, rooftop view, fun atmosphere.

Review Text: Excellent service. Cool atmosphere. Not busy for a Friday night. Great music. Good whisky selection. Had some weird Mexican appetizer (like a puffed pasty) that was delicious with hot sauce!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very nice bar. Drinks are good. Fun fact: their curtains are actually made of heavy metal hoops. Could be considered pricey but I don't mind paying a premium if it repels certain crowds.

Review Text: I went on a Thursday night around 8 pm. It was very full but not overly packed. The place has a lot of potential, the decor is gorgeous, the cocktails are delicious and the staff is attentive and welcoming. …

Review Text: Large choice of cocktails. Nice concept. I need to come again to try other drinks from the menu. The food was also very good. I definitely recommend 👌

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: The Nacarat Bar is a very beautiful bar with a great atmosphere. The staff are cordial and the cocktails they serve are unique and have great flavor combinations. Kevin, Dimitry and Valerie are fantastic staff. This bar is classy, relaxing and great for chilling at night!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: I went for a 5 @ 7 with a friend (arrived at 5:30pm on a Thursday) and it was very busy and crowded. It was hard to maneuver towards the bar and almost impossible to get past...anyone. We felt that wherever we stood we were in the way. We …

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: My favorite bar in Montreal! Nicely decorated, relaxed laid back vibe and great cocktails! Can't wait till this lockdown is over to go there!

Name: Nacarat
Review Text:
Amazing drinks and cocktails, service is great and the atmosphere is really trendy, upbeat and friendly. Also great beats from the DJ in the background it is at the perfect volume.
10/10

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Very nice cocktail bar! Not crazy expensive even though it is in a fairmont hotel, ambiance is great, cocktails inventive and food decent and affordable! Perfect for a fun happy hour

Name: Nacarat
Review Text:

The rooftop experience was nice but ended at 10pm as they say it bothers hotel clientel... which was disappointing.

Name: Nacarat
Review Text: Trendy bar focusing on mixology and service. In house DJ, creative bar menu to accompany cocktails and wide range of seating options not normally seen in a hotel bar. Pleasantly surprised and will return.
